baseMessages.content:
You are a classifier that identifies which of the following real estate attributes are mentioned in the text: 
                        ["totalArea", "complexYear", "numberOfBalconies", "gardenPrice", "hasAttic", "flatYear", "gardenArea", "loggieArea", "isInsulated", "price", "hasBalcony", "garagePrice", "hasParking", "floor", "garageArea", "rooms", "numberOfTerraces", "hasSeparateToilet", "numberOfCellars", "balconyArea", "flatArea", "hasTerrace", "totalFloors", "cellarArea", "hasGarden", "flatModificationYear", "complexModificationYear", "terraceArea", "hasGarage", "parkingPrice", "hasCellar", "hasLoggie", "storey", "numberOfLoggias", "hasElevator", "totalStoreys"].

                        Return only the attribute names that are explicitly or implicitly mentioned.
                        Do not guess. Only return attributes that are clearly present.

examples.content: Input: We offer for sale a spacious 4-room attic apartment on Moyzesova Street, without a balcony, with an area of 149.23 m2 located on the 3rd storey. The apartment features separate non-through rooms and a living room that is shared with the living area within the space. The apartment features one separate toilet shared with the bathroom and another separate toilet, storage space, a pantry, an entrance hallway, and two spacious wardrobes. The apartment comes with a small garden and a shared ownership interest in the land. Parking is available with a resident card, or by arrangement in the courtyard. The apartment building is managed by the management company Bytterm, and internet and TV in the apartment are installed by UPC. Apartment amenities : - basement space - brick with dimensions of 12 m2 - attic storage space - the apartment has lowered ceilings - floors - wooden parquet flooring throughout the apartment - insulation The apartment is connected to the gas supply - separate meter, electricity - separate meter, water - sub-metering. Heating and hot water are provided by a private gas boiler and a boiler for hot water. The property appraisal will be available. Total price for the property 255000 € .

{ "attributes": ["rooms", "hasBalcony", "flatArea", "hasCellar", "isInsulated", "floor", "hasSeparateToilet", "price", "hasParking", "cellarArea", "totalFloors", "hasGarden", "storey", "totalStoreys", "numberOfBalconies"] }

Input: WE OFFER FOR SALE A 2-ROOM APARTMENT B7 ON THE 2ND STOREY IN THE CENTER OF ŽILINA IN THE KOLEČKO RESIDENCE PROJECT ABOUT THE PROJECT The Kolečko Residence offers premium living in the absolute center of the city of Žilina. The project is unique due to its unusual structure, which combines residential and non-residential spaces to ensure the highest quality and comfort of living for residents. Most of the apartments are oriented towards the private garden within the residential complex. The commercial spaces located above the main road create a natural barrier between the noise of the city and the tranquility of your home. The uniqueness of the entire project is also confirmed by the fact that, as one of the few apartment buildings, it offers larger apartments than is customary in the city center. In addition to classic 2-room apartments, spacious 3, 4, and 5-room apartments are also available. EVERYTHING AT YOUR FINGERTIPS The pharmacy and drugstore are located almost at the doorstep of the apartment building, and residents will find two shopping centers within walking distance - Aupark (4 minutes) and Mirage (6 minutes) . The boulevard is just 8 minutes' walk away, along with Marian Square (4 minutes), where residents can find almost anything, completing the concept of ideal urban living. In close proximity to the residential complex, there is a kindergarten, an elementary school, and several high schools. There is also a children's playground and a park at Studničky within 500 meters. This means one thing: a perfect environment for families with children. The price includes complete furnishings of the apartment in a high-standard finish, which the client can choose according to their own preferences. BASIC INFORMATION : Type: Sale Type: 2 room apartment Floor : 2nd storey Apartment: B7 Condition: new construction Usable area: 62.90 m2 Terrace: 22.70 m2 Cellar: 2.98 m2

Input: We would like to present to you a great opportunity to purchase a spacious and sunny 3-room apartment in one of the most sought-after areas of Žilina, in the popular Hájik neighborhood. This 70 m2 apartment offers the perfect combination of comfort, functionality, and a pleasant environment, making it an excellent choice for families, couples, or individuals seeking modern and comfortable living in a tranquil location. The apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a total of 8 in a modern panel apartment building equipped with an elevator, ensuring convenient access for families with small children and elderly individuals. The overall layout of the apartment is very practical and designed to provide everything necessary for a pleasant daily life. The apartment has undergone partial reconstruction, including the installation of new floating floors two years ago, which has not only enhanced the aesthetics but also the overall comfort of living. The interior of the apartment features a spacious entrance hallway with practical built-in wardrobes that provide ample storage space. The bright and spacious living room is ideal for relaxation, family gatherings, or entertaining friends. The bedroom and children's room are south-facing, ensuring pleasant sunlight throughout the day. The kitchen is modern, with a kitchen unit replaced 10 years ago, providing ample space for cooking and comfortable family moments. The kitchen leads to a pleasant loggia measuring 2 m2, where you can enjoy your morning coffee or relax after a long day. The apartment features a brick core, with the bathroom and separate toilet providing a practical and comfortable solution for everyday needs. Overall, the apartment is an ideal place for families looking for a spacious and well-furnished home. The location of the apartment in the popular area of Hájik offers excellent amenities. In the immediate vicinity, there are a kindergarten and elementary school, playgrounds, and parks that are ideal for family activities. Shops, restaurants, and cafes are also available, ensuring a comfortable and convenient everyday living experience. In the vicinity, you will also find a church, a pharmacy, and a florist, which enhances the practicality of this location. Excellent public transport connections ensure quick access to the city center and surrounding areas. Why choose this apartment? This sunny and spacious apartment in the Hájik housing estate is the perfect choice for those seeking comfortable living with plenty of leisure activities available in the area. Its strategic location, high-quality reconstruction, and advantageous layout make it a great home for families and individuals alike. If you are interested in this property, do not hesitate to contact us for more information or to arrange a viewing. We are happy to assist you with the entire financing process and loan arrangement, collaborating with reputable financial institutions. We look forward to your interest and are happy to help you turn this apartment into your dream home.
